code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> PENDING: Invoice Created

    PENDING --> PROCESSING: Payment Initiated
    PENDING --> CANCELLED: User Cancelled
    PENDING --> EXPIRED: Timeout Reached

    PROCESSING --> COMPLETED: Payment Verified
    PROCESSING --> FAILED: Payment Error

    FAILED --> PENDING: Retry Payment

    COMPLETED --> PARTIALLY_REFUNDED: Partial Refund
    COMPLETED --> REFUNDED: Full Refund

    PARTIALLY_REFUNDED --> REFUNDED: Remaining Refund

    CANCELLED --> [*]
    EXPIRED --> [*]
    REFUNDED --> [*]

    note right of PENDING
        Invoice awaiting payment
        Valid for 1 hour (default)
    end note

    note right of PROCESSING
        Payment being verified
        Transaction in progress
    end note

    note right of COMPLETED
        Payment successful
        Preimage verified
    end note

    note right of FAILED
        Payment failed
        Retryable errors can
        transition back to PENDING
    end note

    note right of REFUNDED
        Full or partial refund
        completed
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 * 和 default。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 '* 和 default'。
